```{r}
#| include: false
#| message: false

library(gt)
library(tibble)

```

This page will be updated regularly to include links to assignment submission pages, which includes assignment-specific information, as well as to have accessible lecture slides for you to review.

### Week 1: Thinking About Public Speaking

```{r}
schedule <- tibble(
  Content = "Introduction to the Course; Why Public Speaking Matters; Ethics; Speaking Confidently",
  Lectures = "[The Bigger Questions of Public Speaking](classfiles/slides/week1day2.pptx)",
  Readings = paste0(
    '<u>*"Stand Up, Speak Out"*</u><br>',
    "Why Public Speaking <br>Matters - [Chapter 1](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1eW6GuodbB7qZsEVSWnib1mRyQp17ugeY)<br>",
    "Ethics - [Chapter 2](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1sRb372zzEWWy-RdT_mWUdemXfHlAjZqP)<br>",
    "Speaking Confidently - [Chapter 3](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1gqsEWOv-FgEgDhGCKi64mPayeCIAQ_yu)"
  ),
  Assignments = "[***Syllabus Quiz***](https://classes.lanecc.edu/mod/assign/view.php?id=4743212)"
)

schedule |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_markdown(columns = c(Lectures, Readings, Assignments)) |> 
  cols_align(
    align = "left",
    columns = everything()
  )
```
